definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: sheep-raiser, -dealer, or -tender (Lag:NB108);—abs. ´[[נ]] only 2Ki 3:4 (of Mesha, king of Moab); pl. [[אֲשֶׁר בַּנּׂקְדִים מִתְּקוֹע]] Am 1:1 (of Amos, v. Dr; cf. Am 7:14, where read [[נוקד]] for [[בוקר]] acc. to We Now Dr, not GASm, v. Bu infr.); perh. gloss, cf. Bu:Kohut Memorial.106 f. Now:ad loc.
